attributes.action: amend the student loan to give a more accurate representation of the actual rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the interest on student loans is fixed for one year at a time, this means that this year it has been and remains far higher than the average rate of inflation. The consequence of this is that everyone with a student loan is unfairly having to pay back too much money due to the additional interest.

A fairer system would be to use the average rate of interest each month then charge all student loan holders that rate a month in arrears.

This system while being fairer on students could potentially also ensures that no-one loses money in infaltion terms since any month the rate of interest on student loans could be adjusted to accomodate any change in interest.
